communications.communication:
Dear FBI:

This is a request for records under the Freedom of Information Act. 

RECORDS REQUESTED

I request all records related to Barry Louis Romo. Mr. Romo was born on 24 July 1947 in San Bernardino, California, USA and died on 1 May 2024.  

PROOF OF DEATH

I have attached Mr. Romo’s news obituary from the Washington Post, as reprinted in Stars and Stripes.

CROSS-REFERENCE SEARCH

In addition to your standard search, please also perform a cross-reference search of records related to the following organizations and events to see if they contain additional records related to Mr. Romo.

1. Vietnam Veterans Against the War
2. Iraq Veterans Against the War
3. United States Postal Service
4. Winter Soldier hearings

FEES

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. If you decide to charge me fees, please let me know in advance if those fees will exceed $25. 

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that you fulfill this request electronically, producing responsive records via email attachment if available or on CD-ROM if not.

CONCLUSION

Thank you for responding to this request.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz
